page.title: 10New Industrial Area - Darwen
page.content: Interview with{Cllr.Tom Hardman, recent{Chairman of Planning Committee re new{Goosehouse Industrial Area. Good industrial premises difficult to find; old buildings difficult to heat,ventilate,adapt and make sanitary Industrial land scarce. Modern units need to be near good{transport links, but nearby{railway}and planned {motorway}played no part in choice of this area. {Council}got grants from{EEC}and gave more itself. Firms can get aid for building costs. He is against advance factories. Prefers small businesses where men can work as a team but would welcome any firm bringing work to Darwen. New industries would be best. Other sites are available at{Colters {Farm, Brunswick Street and Hollins {Grove Mill.
